title: New Illaoi Skin?
body: Right now the only choices are green and purple, and as an illaoi main, both of those are pretty lackluster. I'm not asking for pool noodles to come out of the ground but anything a little more creative please. Thank you.

replies.body: I'm curious, what would you want for an Illaoi skin?

http://i1.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/649/568/1c8.gif

wacky arm flailing inflatable tube Illaoi

Hmmmmm.....

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/cZGGsIly-idea-for-an-illaoi-skin

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-19T20:57:00.697+0000)
>
> I'm curious, what would you want for an Illaoi skin?

* **Candy Queen Illaoi** - Gummi Worm tentacles, Taffy for her E grab, Carries a jar of jelly beans for her idol, eats small gummi worms during her recall.
* **Adventurer Illaoi** - Bullwhips for tentacles (with "cracks" for sfx), E tentacle wraps around target (like _Temple of Doom_ ending), Ultimate looks like the impact of a boulder.
* **Pasta/Ramen Chef Illaoi** - Noodles tentacles.

> [{quoted}](name=TerraRising,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=0001000d,timestamp=2017-06-19T22:52:30.073+0000)
>
> * **Candy Queen Illaoi** - Gummi Worm tentacles, Taffy for her E grab, Carries a jar of jelly beans for her idol, eats small gummi worms during her recall.
> * **Adventurer Illaoi** - Bullwhips for tentacles (with "cracks" for sfx), E tentacle wraps around target (like _Temple of Doom_ ending), Ultimate looks like the impact of a boulder.
> * **Pasta/Ramen Chef Illaoi** - Noodles tentacles.

^^^this,candy queen illaoi omg{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
And she carries a giant meatball as her idol thing haha
and eat it in the recall xDDD that would be awsome bro
i like your ideas bro that candy Queen illaoui bro so COOL xDD it would fit with the surprise party skin xDD that would be sick {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I can imagine that {{champion:420}} Illaoi skins would be hard, because you always have to consider the tentacles...
I think you could get away with: 
 - an Elderwood skin, where she becomes an Ent-like creature and her tentacles are enchanted vines/tree roots.
 - A Worldbreaker skin, it would also suit her.
 - Brands "Spirit-fire" theme, making the tentacles flaming hands.
 - Pool-party Illaoi, everyone is pretty much expecting this one.
 - Atlanean Illaoi, though it would need some form of differentiation from Pool-party.
 - an Infernal/Volcanic skin where her tentacles are tendrils of lava.
 - expanding the Eternum line with her, it's a little lonely with just {{champion:56}} Nocturne and {{champion:421}} Rek'Sai.
 - A chef-themed skin, let her love of barbecue be known! 

Technological or ice-themes skins would have to be considered VERY carefully, because they're a bit of a stretch for her thematically.
Well now {{champion:69}} is joining that line as well, but as an illaoi main I would like some other choices from green/purple and red would be an awesome addition to her champion.

elderwood would be pretty neat, being some spin on a druid or something, spawning tree-like constructs 

nightmare illaoi with body-horror spawns, like twisted limbs and stuff, might be too mature

something fire or earth themed would be great, too 

dreadnova as well

Everyone knows the one skin she truly needs is the DunkMistress

And while we're on this theme Dodgeball Syndra
Dark Star for our Dark Star top lane champion!
holding a galaxy or something as her totem and the tentacles are like little solar flares, would be sick
I assume her next skin is already decided and/or in development, but a luchador skin for her would also be dope. Pool Party would be awesome too!

I think dunkmaster illaoi would make the most sense. the tentacles can stay generally the same, but i would think this skin could also be chroma'd and the tentacles would match the jersey color. could be sick.
it also sort of fits her quotes. about like motion, and teaching lessons. like she is gonna school them and dunk on them in basketball lmfao
one quote could be modified.

instead of " break hearts. I break spines" it could be "I break hearts, I break ankles" lol
Atlantean also makes sense, thematically. could be like water tentacles and she is like water bending.
A skin where her recall is her pulling out a bowl of mangoes from somewhere, and then she proceeds to stuff her face with mangoes

Groovy Illaoi, where she's from an old timey cartoon (think old mickey mouse or cuphead as a more recent example)

Tentacles could be dancing flowers that slam face down for their attacks
her Idol could be a bomb
her test of spirit pull has to be  a slide whistle cane pull like old vaudeville
When people get vessel'd things turn super groovy as she pulls you into cartoon world
and her ult has her blow up her bomb.


Honestly I just love the Groovy type of  theme, I played toon monsters in yu-gi-oh and loved timeless river in kingdom hearts.
Any type of skins in this sort of theme would be great.

An HP Lovecraft type skin. Not one where she's a crazed cultist, but one where she's dressed in a suit, coat, and hat. Her idol is a briefcase that leaks papers that form into the tentacles. Her recall could have the briefcase flying opening and her scrambling to shove the pages back in to seal away the secrets.
Some kind of Halloween Illaoi with an orange fiery color scheme and her idol can be a jack-o-lantern

STAR-effin'-GUARDIAN! 
Puhlease!

Something goofy, like "Car Salesman Illaoi". Make the tentacles Airdancers, give her a tacky outfit, and some silly prop for her totem. Actually, along those lines, the OP's idea isn't too shabby - pool noodles, a tentacle-themed tropical shirt, and a beach ball for a totem.

Huh... interesting idea...

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/cZGGsIly-idea-for-an-illaoi-skin
She eats ribs on her back, she talks about how great barbecue is yet we never see it expressed!
A Skin who fits her Character. Maybe a Skin from the Dreadnova Skinline. Just make her Badass and no 750 Rp Skin!

> [{quoted}](name=Dream Goddess,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-06-19T21:06:08.493+0000)
>
> A Skin who fits her Character. Maybe a Skin from the Dreadnova Skinline. Just make her Badass and no 750 Rp Skin!

this!

~~Hentai~~ Anime Villainess.  

Something cthulu related, maybe gothic horror meets eldrich horror.

Seafood Chef Illaoi (or fisherman illoai)

Captain Illoai - either moby dick but with tentacles or 20,000 leagues under the sea illoai

How about a plant based illoai skin where her tentacles become vines?

Dunkmaster Illaoi.
Car Saleswoman Illaoi (Whacky inflatable guys as tentacles)

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-19T20:57:00.697+0000)
>
> I'm curious, what would you want for an Illaoi skin?

dreadnova, elderwood, gatekeeper, darkstar

EDIT: or Waod Queen with a barbaric outfit and baron as tentacles

Omega Red Illaoi

Dunkmaster Illaoi

Pool Party Illaoi

Mango picker Illaoi

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-19T20:57:00.697+0000)
>
> I'm curious, what would you want for an Illaoi skin?

I have 2 thematic in mind when it comes to Illa .... 

**Infernal Illaoi**

- The tentacle will be Red with Black spike
- The champ will be dressed in a full body red Inferal armor with lots of spike and living Fire texture running trougth it .... while her body apperance remain mostly humans she will feature big horns and white long hair partially hihded unher an helmet 

.... For reference the Varusaburosu or Akantor Female bladmaster armors from MH series maybe be a good starting point of what i have in mind 

Ripping your sould and summoning tentacle will never be more fitting XD 

**Soul Reaver Illaoi**

- Again most of the work will be on the champ. A dravenish attire with a full model rework changin illa in a Reper dressed in Blue and Black amor.
- Thentacle will just follow the new main theme

Please see the link: https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-creations-en/xi5iYIrU-illaoi-skin
Personally, I would love to slap someone with a poro even though i don't how that would do damage exactly. :D :P

**Hextech Illaoi** - Has Hextech turrets instead of tentacles that charge up and fire instead of slamming. Instead of an idol, Illaoi carries a massive Hextech cannon that she fires with her W. E could potentially project a hologram of the target instead of their soul, or something to that effect. Ult could either be a turret kit that she uses to instantly set up several turrets, or just slamming the cannon into the ground, creating a huge shockwave.
Honestly anything. a ton of great suggestions in here. Show my main some love.
Project: Illaoi. Or mabye programm thiccc robotic tentaclesss
I have an idea, but it is probably not board appropriate :p
everyone knows illaoi is the dunkmistress  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=VioletWolf,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=00010013,timestamp=2017-06-21T09:16:03.200+0000)
>
> everyone knows illaoi is the dunkmistress  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Her w is great for that, but the tentacles... How you'd make them?

The answer for that always seemed pretty obvious to me. Just put big foam fingers on the ends of the tentacles, like an adoring crowd.

Or, alternatively if it's a bit pricier skin, tiny skirts and pom poms on the ends for cheerleading tentacles.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Pool Party Illaoi
https://i.imgur.com/xBKTVyK.jpg

also Gatekeeper Illaoi
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cbg60dtVIAAFhco.jpg
She's getting a skin, riot announced it.

> [{quoted}](name=KuroCaliber,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AdHximqZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-19T12:52:32.884+0000)
>
> She's getting a skin, riot announced it.

Actually, they said they were "confident committing" that several champs, including Illaoi, would get skins by early May 2017.

It's clever wordplay that gives them an out if they fail to deliver.

I do not agree about the first two skins: the basic skin is good, the animations are cool and the phrases of the champion are really excellent! I think we have one of the characters whose story is the most worked! By cons I agree 100% for the lack of skin: when I see that Blitz will still have a skin, while Ilaoi has never had additional skin to the chroma starting! I wonder if another champion on LoL is also badly treated!

(Sorry for my english)

I would like something like a Arcade Illaoi with blue sky tentacle or a Dreadnova Illaoi with red tentacle <3

If possible both xD
Darkstar illaoi... Nuff said
Literally anything! I mean her top and I just want a new skin for her!
Bloodmoon Illaoi Soon{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Arclight Illaoi plx
Soulstealer Illaoi, green tentacles.
